story.text: O/R Broker, because it allows me to map my relational tables to true object-oriented classes, not just anemic [[Java Beans]]. And it allows me to store my SQL statements, with named parameters, in individual text files. [http://orbroker.sourceforge.net orbroker.sourceforge.net]

O/R Broker, because it allows me to map my relational tables to true object-oriented classes, not just anemic [[Java Beans]]. And it allows me to store my SQL statements, with named parameters, in individual text files. [http://orbroker.sourceforge.net orbroker.sourceforge.net]
